snippet: David Brat, who beat Eric Cantor, and Jack Trammell, the academic colleague Mr. Brat faces in the election, have found themselves unprepared for the political fishbowl.
abstract: David Brat, Randolph-Macon College economics professor who defeated Rep Eric Cantor in Republican primary, will now face off against Democratic candidate Jack Trammel, campus colleague who teaches sociology; before two men became overnight political rivals, they knew each other best as teammates on faculty basketball squad.

byline.original: By TRIP GABRIEL and RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA
byline.contributor: Trip Gabriel reported from Ashland, and Richard Pérez-Peña from New York.

lead_paragraph: David Brat, who beat Eric Cantor, and Jack Trammell, the academic colleague Mr. Brat faces in the election, have found themselves unprepared for the political fishbowl.

headline.seo: David Brat and Jack Trammell show unease in the spotlight
headline.main: Campus Colleagues, Basketball Teammates, and Now, Political Rivals
headline.print_headline: Campus Colleagues, Basketball Teammates, and Now, Political Rivals
